name: fantalab_fake
description: This project is a local desktop application using Electron for the shell, React for the frontend, and SQLite for persistent local storage. It displays a large list of objects, each with a category (P, D, C, or A), a name, and other numerical or textual data (nullable). Objects are visualized as cards in four lists (by category). Users can reorder cards within a category (drag-and-drop), and the order is saved in SQLite for persistence across app restarts.
